text: Very interesting museum. It has different variety of artists and at different era. Great experience, try it too.
The Grevin is so amazing!!! I want to go back here again to have more pictures! All of my group had fan and its really realistic wax copy of the celebrities!
Amazing detail. Fun games! Will go back soon! I will bring my family. Will also tell friends to go when they are in Seoul!
Very nice place with cool virtual simulation. I recommend everyone to go to this place if you have extra time in Seoul.
